string.value: I better go visit Chil Sung at the Korean Folk Town.

Chil Sung and Chil Nam are brothers living in Korean Folk Town. Chil Sung was worried that his brother Chil Nam didn't have much food with him, and asked me if I could secretly place his sack of rice on Chil Nam's stacks.
I received a sack of rice from Chil Sung, and placed it on top of a stack of rice in front of Chil Nam's house.

Hello there, you must be new to this town; you don't look familiar. I live here in town with my younger brother, farming for a living. We harvested our crops a few days ago, but there's something that concerns me right now. I have split the Sack of Rice equally between my brother and me, but my brother raises more kids, and...

I'd much prefer giving my brother a little more of #t4031229#, but I know he won't accept it. That's why ... can you please secretly put one #t4031229# on top of the stack of rice in front of my brother's house? My brother Chil Nam lives at the very east of this town.
I urge you, please make sure my brother doesn't know about this~
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have asked for such a huge favor to a stranger. I apologize for my mishap.
I see a stack of rice stacked at the garden of Chil Nam's house. Secretly, I brought out a sack of rice and laid it unnoticeably on top of the stack.
This is Chil Nam's stack of rice.
Hey, please make sure Chil Nam doesn't find out about this.
